channel.title: Need help with .dat/.idx
channel.description:
i am using a [IP] client and i added a cache and i used a .dat/idx to overwrite the runescape background but i don't know how to change .dat. by co-ower / coder made the background to his appeal and know we don't talk so i wanna change the background but i don't know how to open up the .dat/.idx
we can Skype or Teamviewer which ever one you would prefer.

item.title: Need help with .dat/.idx
item.dc:creator: @Onix Onix
item.description:
@Onix wrote:

Get a cache packer / editor.

Read full topic
